scripts.build: echo 'Backend deployment - no frontend build needed'
scripts.build:client: if [ -d "client" ]; then cd client && npm install && npm run build; else echo 'Client directory not found - skipping frontend build'; fi
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend build complete - no compilation needed for Node.js'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build:client
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Vercel build for backend - no frontend build needed'
